    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020512</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La crisis republicana (133-31 a.C.)</string>
            <string language="en">The crisis of the Republic (133-31 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Krise der Republik (133-31 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La crise de la République (133-31 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A crise da república (133-31 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La crisi della Repubblica (133-31 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κρίση της Δημοκρατίας (133-31 B.C.)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Texto explicativo de las causas que determinaron la crisis republicana, su desarrollo y su final, acompañado de enlaces a glosario (conceptos y personajes) y actividad (crucigrama).</string>
            <string language="en">Text explaining the causes of the Republican crisis, its evolution and end, with links to a glossary (concepts and personalities) and an activity (crossword).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">república</string>
            <string language="en">republic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Text, der die Ursachen der republikanischen Krise, seiner 
Entwicklung und des Endes, mit Links einem Glossar beschreibt 
(Konzepte und Funktionseigenschaften) und einer Aktivität 
(Kreuzworträtsel).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Texte expliquant les causes de la crise républicaine, de 
son évolution et d'extrémité, avec des liens à un glossaire 
(concepts et personnalités) et à une activité (mots croisé).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Texto que explica as causas da crise republicana, de sua 
evolução e de extremidade, com ligações a um glossário (conceitos
e personalidades) e a uma atividade (crossword).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Testo che spiega le cause della crisi Repubblicana, del 
relativo sviluppo e dell'estremità, con i collegamenti ad un 
glossario (concetti e personalità) e ad un'attività (parole 
incrociate).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κείμενο που εξηγεί τις αιτίες της δημοκρατικής 
κρίσης, της εξέλιξης και του τέλους του, με τις συνδέσεις με ένα 
γλωσσάρι (έννοιες και προσωπικότητες) και μια δραστηριότητα 
(σταυρόλεξο).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Republik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">république</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">repubblica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δημοκρατία</string>
          </keyword>
